docs.title: Welcome to Prinus.info Documentation
docs.text: You can see the result site on prinus.info.

docs.title: Description
docs.text: These pages are dedicated to any mutual work I'm planning to do on my web-site project. If I sharedc these pages with you most likely I invite you to join my project and support it by any means.
